titles.title: To exempt Social Security, Medicare, and Medicaid from any Federal balanced budget requirement, and for other purposes.
To exempt Social Security, Medicare, and Medicaid from any Federal balanced budget requirement, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary: This bill exempts Social Security benefits, payments under Medicare, and payments to states under Medicaid from any federal balanced budget requirement.
